title: Justiţia europeană confirmă suspendarea canalului de știri rusesc RT France
cleaned_sentences: European justice confirms the suspension of the Russian news channel RT France The European justice rejected the request of the RT France news channel on Wednesday (ex-Russia Today) to cancel the suspension of diffusion decided in EU sanctions against Moscow, according to a decision consulted by AFP.

Watch the latest G4Media video productions - The article continues below - In his decision, the EU Court argues that this "temporary prohibition" does not "discuss" freedom of expression as such, "as opposed to the Russian media, sanctioned after the invasion of Ukraine by Moscow.
RT France has already announced that it will appeal after the decision of European justice.
